title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.7 - Reasonable care required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.7 - Reasonable care required

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated carelessly or negligently or in
disregard of the right or safety of others, or without due caution and
circumspection, or at a rate of speed or in a manner so as to endanger persons
or property. Nothing contained in or omitted from the rules and regulations
contained in this Chapter shall be construed to relieve any person whatsoever
from exercising all reasonable care to avoid or prevent injury or damage to
persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

654.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
